page.title: 09VICAR
page.content: In 1965 Mr. Fermor came to Northend as a vicar.He came to Northend because he thought it was very important to have a vicar in a village.Each Sunday around 30 people go to church. As well as his regular Sunday services,a vicar's job is to marry people,perform funeral services and christening services. The vicars job is also to look after the spiritual welfare of the village which includes visiting people sick and the elderly.He also visits people when someone of their family have died. Altogether Mr. Fermor is the vicar for 5 different churches.
